name: TwitterFutzing
longDescription: This is a simple web app to read in Twitter Archives of a user's tweets and do some charting and NLP analysis. Web site has the option to also export data to a zip file containing all images/charts and the original data in CSV form and also CSVs of original data plus analysis data.< /p>
description: This is a simple web app to read in Twitter Archives of a user's tweets and do some charting and NLP analysis. Web site has the option to also export data to a zip file containing all images/charts and the original data in CSV form and also CSVs of original data plus analysis data.
